titleStmt.title: 10th Kentucky Cavalry Partisan Rangers, Company H (reorganized as Company I)

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: 10th Kentucky Cavalry Partisan Rangers, Company H (reorganized as Company I)

body.p: A company of Adam Rankin Johnsonâ€™s 10th Kentucky Cavalry of the Confederate States. Originally formed as Company H in September 1862 in Daviess County and Union County Kentucky, prior to reorganization as Company I. Commander(s): Captain Henry Clay Meriwether.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky: Confederate Kentucky Volunteers, vol. 2 (Hartford, Ky.: Cook & McDowell Publications: 1980), 64 and 272; Adam Rankin Johnson, The Partisan Rangers of the Confederate States Army, ed. William J. Davis (G. G. Fetter Company, 1904), 327-329.
